preference.name: MEProcessResourcesViewDisplayNameColumnsShownPref
preference.preference_description: Defines the columns to display in the Process Resources view in Manufacturing Process Planner. Valid Values: Accepts a list of valid Teamcenter object and internal property names separated by a period. object-type-name.internal-property-name
